components.name: Capistrano CLI
components.description: The command-line interface that users interact with to initiate deployment tasks.

components.name: Rake Tasks
components.description: Custom scripts written in Ruby that define the steps for deployment, including server commands and configurations.

components.name: SSH Connection
components.description: The secure channel used to connect to remote servers for executing deployment tasks.

components.name: Deployment Servers
components.description: The target servers where applications are deployed, which can have different roles such as web server, database server, etc.

data_flows.description: The CLI sends commands to Rake tasks to initiate the deployment process.
Rake tasks execute commands over the SSH connection to perform actions on the deployment servers.
Commands are sent through the SSH connection to the deployment servers for execution.

trust_boundaries.name: User and Deployment Environment
trust_boundaries.description: The boundary between the user's local environment and the remote deployment servers.
